creator: ravi.ramasamy@diagonal-consulting.com
text:
I am working in the Portal development environment (SAP PDK).

I am trying to connect to a Mobile device. The SAP documentation saying that I 
have to add an entry in this file and save as .cap file (ex: Nokia8250.cap) in 
order to connect to any mobile devices.

I could not find 'template.cap' and a folder 'mobile' in a servlet engine (ex: 
C:\tomcat\...). Could you please let me know how do I go further. Please 
advise. Many thanks in advance.

I am using...
Servlet Engine: tomcat3.3.1
PDK            : 5.0.5.0
Java           : 1.3.1_07 


Best Regards,
Ravi
The bug report seems invalid, thanks to clarify and reopen if necessary
creator: hgomez@apache.org
